body.p: This is the CMIF file prepared for project „Wirkungsgeschichte von Goethes Werk ‚Zur Farbenlehre‘ in Berlin 1810–1832“ providing metadata for approx 880 transcribed letters. It is prepared by script from TEI source files that do not contain the correspDesc element.
This file is meant to be read by the CorrespSearch indexer. No further usage is intended.
